bibl.title: with contributions by M. BUCHHOLZ, R.-L. CHANG, C. FUHRMANN, M. GERHARDT, M. DE GROOTE, L. GUICHARD, A. HARTMANN, P. JAMES, I. KARAMANOU, R. KRITZER, B. LAUDENBACH, D. LEITH, N. LITINAS, K. LUBITZ, M. MALOUTA, F. MALTOMINI, G. DEL MASTRO, D. MONTSERRAT †, T. MURGATROYD, O. PELCER, C. PERNIGOTTI, A. SYRKOU, The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Volume LXXV (Nos 5020-5071). (Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No. 96.)
bibl.note: P. Oxy. LXXV, 5020-5071. - I. Theological Texts (5020-5024). - II. New Literary Texts (5025-5026). - III. Known Literary Texts (5027-5048). - IV. Documentary Texts (5049-5071).
